name: circley-frontend
description: Bundled Circley prototype powered by esbuild (no Vite).

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-static && esbuild src/main.jsx --bundle --format=esm --minify --sourcemap --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --outfile=dist/bundle.js
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run preview
